plot: A comedy about an alcoholic lawyer who is the last hope for a meek college professor who has been accused of sexual harassment.
title: Sober 'till Proven Drunk
plot_es: A comedy about an alcoholic lawyer who is the last hope for a meek college professor who has been accused of sexual harassment.
plot_en: A comedy about an alcoholic lawyer who is the last hope for a meek college professor who has been accused of sexual harassment.
